attributes.action: All against building on our Childrens centre!
attributes.additional_details: For all those against building on our Children centre/ Nursery.  There is a proposal of 50 new dwellings planned to be situated at the top of the Children's centre.  For all the parents that attend this service already find how hard the parking is let alone the effect it will have on the surrounding housing estates.  The traffic will be horrendous and the safety of the children will be majorly compromised!  Please sign to show your support for the safety and wellbeing of all those effected. Many thanks.
